You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesH H] > &hscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Hscr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/210b/index.htm U+0210B].
  * `&hscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4BD.
